TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebActionable

summary.span: 启用 控件或其他服务器控件以包含谓词集合。

span.span: Enables controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件中的谓词是用户可在用户界面（UI）中执行的操作。A verb in controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI). 通常，谓词由可单击的控件（如按钮、链接或菜单项）在 UI 中表示。Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item. Web 部件控制集提供默认情况下可用于 控件和其他服务器控件（如自定义控件、ASP.NET 控件和用户控件）的标准谓词，这些控件在置于 区域时可以像 控件一样操作。The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like controls when placed in zones. 标准谓词包括关闭、最小化、还原、删除、编辑和导出。Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export. 你还可以创建自定义谓词以用于 和服务器控件。You can also create custom verbs for use with and server controls. 接口及其 属性，为你提供了一种将自定义谓词集成到控件中的方法。The interface, with its property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls. 类实现 接口并实现其单一属性。The class implements the interface and implements its single property. 若要向从 类继承的控件添加自定义谓词，必须重写 属性，将自定义谓词添加到集合中，然后返回集合。To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the class, you must override the property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection. 属性引用的集合仅包含自定义谓词;此集合中不包含标准谓词。The collection referenced by the property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection. 控件中 属性的默认返回值 `null`，因为在默认情况下，集合中没有自定义谓词。The default return value of the property in a control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection. 向不 控件的服务器控件添加自定义谓词需要一个额外的步骤。Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not controls requires one extra step. 在这些情况下，控件还必须实现 接口并实现 属性。In those cases, the controls must also implement the interface and implement the property. 将自定义谓词添加到 集合后，Web 部件控件集会自动处理创建和呈现自定义谓词所需的其他步骤。After you have added custom verbs to the collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何简单实现 接口。The following code example demonstrates a simple implementation of the interface. 此代码示例的第一部分演示如何在用户控件中实现接口。The first part of the code example shows how the interface is implemented in a user control. 用户控件通过创建两个自定义谓词并定义在用户单击任一谓词时调用的方法来实现 属性。The user control implements the property by creating two custom verbs and defining a method that is called when a user clicks either of the verbs. 为简单起见，这两个谓词使用相同的方法。For simplicity, the same method is used for both verbs. 方法更新名为 `VerbCounterClicks`的属性的值。The method updates the value of a property named `VerbCounterClicks`. `Page_Load` 方法的代码访问控件的 属性，以显示集合中自定义谓词的总计数。The code for the `Page_Load` method accesses the property of the control to display the total count of custom verbs in the collection. 此计数不包括标准 Web 部件谓词。This count does not include the standard Web Parts verbs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbcs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbvb.ascx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是承载用户控件的 .aspx 页。The second part of the code example is an .aspx page that hosts the user control. 由于控件是在 控件中引用的，因此在运行时 ASP.NET 会将用户控件包装在 控件中并将其视为 控件。Because the control is referenced in a control, at run time ASP.NET wraps the user control in a control and treats it as a control. 在浏览器中加载页面后，请注意，控件底部的标签显示 属性引用的集合中有多少个自定义谓词。After you load the page in a browser, notice that the label at the bottom of the control displays how many custom verbs are in the collection referenced by the property. 另请注意，如果单击控件中的谓词菜单，然后单击其中一个谓词，则会出现另一个标签，其中显示了自定义谓词被单击的总次数。Also note that if you click the verbs menu in the control, and click either of the verbs, another label appears showing the total number of times the custom verbs have been clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbhostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbhostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取对自定义 对象的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of custom objects.

value.span: 包含自定义 对象的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用添加到 或其他服务器控件标头中的谓词菜单的自定义谓词的集合（如果有）。The property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a or other server control. 集合不包含对 Web 部件控件集提供的标准 对象的引用，例如 、、、或 。The collection does not contain references to the standard objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as , , , , or . 希望向派生自 类的自定义控件添加自定义谓词的开发人员可以直接重写 类实现的 属性。Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the class can simply override the property that the class implements. 若要将自定义谓词添加到用户控件或不是 控件的自定义控件，则必须通过提供 属性的实现来实现 接口。Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a control, must implement the interface by providing an implementation of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在用户控件中实现的 属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property as implemented in a user control. 可在 类概述主题的 "示例" 部分中找到此代码示例的完整代码。The full code for this code example can be found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 以下部分的代码示例演示了用户控件内 属性的自定义实现。The following portion of the code example demonstrates a custom implementation of the property within a user control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbcs.ascx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbvb.ascx#3)]
